metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31122 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in mod_macro of Apache HTTP Server.This issue affects Apache HTTP Server: through 2.4.57.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
apache2-bin - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
apache2-data - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
apache2-utils - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
libapache2-mod-md - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi - 2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.52-1ubuntu4.7').
